text.author: Sofia Samatar
text.title: A Stranger in Olondria, Chapter Two: Master Lunre
text.summary: A protagonist recounts the day when his father, a patriotic islander, returned from a long journey and unexpectedly brought home a foreign Olondrian tutor from Bain named Master Lunre.
